Create a User, which is the "handle" for communicating with port and device drivers.

createPort

public static Port createPort(java.lang.String portName,
                              PortDriver portDriver,
                              java.lang.String driverName,
                              boolean canBlock,
                              boolean autoConnect,
                              org.epics.pvData.misc.ThreadPriority priority)
Create a port. This is called by a portDriver.

Parameters:
portName - The portName.
portDriver - The portDriver.
driverName - The driver name.
canBlock - Can this port block while performing I/O.
autoConnect - Initial state for autoConnect for the port and its devices.
priority - If the port can block this is the priority for the portThread.
Returns:
The interface for the Port instance.

Get the port interface.

Parameters:
portName - The name of the port.
Returns:
The interface or null if the port does not exits.
